thread.title: Twitter shares soar on first-ever profit

title: Twitter shares soar on first-ever profit
text:
Twitter shares soar on first-ever profit Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:48 
Investors feverishly bought shares of a Twitter, pushing the stock up as much as 25 percent, after the social media platform announced its first-ever quarterly profit. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Investors feverishly bought shares of a Twitter, pushing the stock up as much as 25 percent, after the social media platform announced its first-ever quarterly profit. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2slx9xu
